Name: Master Alchemist
Description: All trophies obtained.

Name: Roze no atelier
Description: See Raze’s story through to the end.

Name: Ururika no atelier
Description: See Ulrika’s story through to the end.

Name: Chapter 1 Clear
Description: Complete the first half of your first term.

Name: Chapter 2 Clear
Description: Complete the second half of your first term.

Name: Chapter 3 Clear
Description: Reach the start of your second term.

Name: Chapter 4 Clear
Description: Complete the first half of your second term.

Name: Chapter 5 Clear
Description: Complete the second half of your second term.

Name: Chapter 6 Clear
Description: Reach the start of your third term.

Name: Chapter 7 Clear
Description: Complete the first half of your third term.

Name: Chapter 8 Clear
Description: Complete the second half of your third term.

Name: Chapter 9 Clear
Description: Wrap up events before graduation.

Name: The 5th Are We Really Gonna Graduate With Nothing Happening Like This Meeting
Description: Clean up the mess of yet another of the girls’ plans.

Name: A Love Retreat for Lovers
Description: Be at the center of Et’s boredom and Lily’s fury.

Name: Lonely or not, that’s not the…
Description: Convince Corona to open up a bit.

Name: Passage of the Punis
Description: Help the Puni brothers prove themselves.

Name: Friendly Workshop
Description: Complete every nonfinale character quest episode in a single playthrough.

Name: Top tier
Description: Synthesize an item with an Ether Level of 100.

Name: Killer Synthesist
Description: Synthesize a total of 1000 in a single playthrough.

Name: Veterans
Description: Win a total of 400 battles in a single playthrough.

Name: Unison
Description: Reach Unite Mode 100 times.

Name: Intimacy
Description: Use an Intimate Strike or Intimate Guard 50 times.

Name: Five Figures
Description: Deal 10,000 damage with a single attack.

Name: Match ‘em up
Description: Get a gathering bonus 50 times.

Name: *huff* *huff* Th-That’s right. I would… never… lose…
Description: Win the Schoolwide Marathon.

Name: Valedictorian
Description: Earn an [A] in every class taken in one playthrough.

Name: Not Amateurs Anymore
Description: Reach 20% Grow Book completion with a character and change his or her class.
Reach 100% Grow Book completion with a character.
Reach 100% Grow Book completion with all characters.

Name: Side Gig
Description: Complete your first Job.

Name: Student… or Staff?
Description: Complete every Job in one playthrough.

Name: A New Shop
Description: Open a Bazaar during Free Time.

Name: Experienced in Sales
Description: Earn a total of 50,000 Cole from the Bazaar.

Name: Favorite Shop
Description: Have a reputation of 100 at the Bazaar.

Name: Deep Pockets
Description: Hold 300,000 Cole at once.

Name: Welcome Guest
Description: Land the finishing blow in a story battle with a guest character.

Name: Undefeated
Description: Complete the game without losing a single fight.
Complete the game without ever allowing a party member to become incapacitated.
Detail: Excludes scripted loss in Raze’s story against Reicher.

Name: Antithetical
Description: As Ulrika, complete the game without using any Usable items.
Detail: Usable items cannot be used in battle, nor in the field. Key items, such as [Wings of Icarus], can be used. Upgrades to gathering equipment, such as [Extreme Cu Hook], are also allowed.
